alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 9:04AM MST until January 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, except 3 to 8 inches above 6000 feet elevation. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The Albion mountains, the mountains of the Raft River region, the Bear River mountains, the Blackfoot mountains the Caribou mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
